title: Assassin's Girl
description: Two years is a long time to be away from the people I care most about, but I am just not ready to see them. Not after what happened. How will I look my brother in the eye after what I did? Would he even forgive me?I have no time to answer these questions because before I know it I’m on a plane heading back to New York. My family’s life is in danger, and they need me.I don’t expect Malia Gilbert to be the one girl in the world who knocks me on my ass. I’m instantly attracted to her and would do anything to keep her safe.The stakes get insanely higher when I find out that not only my family’s lives are in jeopardy, but also that of the woman I love. To keep them safe, I must reach depths that even I fear. But is anywhere too dark for a renowned assassin?
author: Anneke Boshoff
